title: Metroclub 2BR 2ba Luxury Condo w/ pool & parking
description:
Beautiful 2 bedroom 2 bath condo with desirable split layout (one bedroom and one bath on each side of the living area)
available for rent starting June 7, 2022.  Very sunny and bright with walls of windows in every room and skyline views of the city.  24/7 doorman, secure gated parking on site included in rent, full size washer and dryer in the unit, hardwood floors in all living areas, berber carpet in the bedrooms, carrara marble in both bathrooms. Stainless steel appliances and granite counters in the open kitchen with counter seating.  Amenities include swimming pool with cabanas, fitness center, BBQ area, storage lockers on lower level (additional fee), package room, elevator building, recently updated lobby and hallways,  and on site management. Extremely convenient location at 8th and Race within walking distance to Reading Terminal, Jefferson Station, Olde City, and all that Center City has to offer.  Ben Franklin Bridge and I-95 are at your doorstep for commuting.
No smokers and no pets.  Minimum one year lease.  3 months rent due at signing (first, last, security deposit). Excellent credit and references required.  $50. per person application fee.

description:
Available NOW:
Welcome to 1843 E Oakdale St! This stunning 3 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom single family home features hardwood floors, recessed lighting, finished basement, modern finishes, backyard AND two roof decks, and so much more! You enter into a lovely entryway with hardwood floors and natural light pouring in from the front window. Continue back to the sleek kitchen offering white shaker cabinets, tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances including a double-door fridge, gas oven/stove, built-in overhead microwave, and a dishwasher. There is a small back patio off of the kitchen – perfect for enjoying your morning cup of coffee! Head downstairs to the finished basement to find your spacious living area, a half bathroom for your convenience, and tons of storage. Upstairs, the second level features 2 sizable bedrooms with windows and closet space, as well as a full bathroom boasting gorgeous tile, shower/tub combo, and a vanity with additional storage underneath. The third floor is home to the primary bedroom and showcases a large, wall-to-ceiling window, a walk-in closet, a stacked washer/dryer, and a giant bathroom with 2 sinks/vanities, and a walk-in shower with dual shower heads and a sliding glass door. This incredible home also features TWO roof decks – one with unmatched city views! Schedule a tour today!

Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!

The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details.
